description:
Miya Towano (called Miya-sama) is the reigning chairman of the student council at Gokoh Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bravo, Girls! Rocked and Washed Away! Watch Miya`s Counterattack
Girls Bravo! Yurete Nagarete! Gyakushuu no Miya-sama Desu
少女万歳[ガールズブラボー]! 揺れて流れて! 逆襲のミヤ様です~
